wiki.content:
Track 2 from 1998's Adore album. The video for the song was shot in one go with no pauses. The song peaked at 42 in US on the Billboard Hot 100, but got a much warmer response in the UK, getting to the #11 spot, making it their 3rd most successful song in the UK, along with Disarm.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Track 2 from 1998's Adore album. The video for the song was shot in one go with no pauses. The song peaked at 42 in US on the Billboard Hot 100, but got a much warmer response in the UK, getting to the #11 spot, making it their 3rd most successful song in the UK, along with Disarm.

track.name: Ava Adore
comments: The last great song written by the pumpkins. Maybe even Corgan period.
Lovely girl, you’re the beauty in my world. Without you there aren’t reasons left to find (9)
I think it's my Smashing Pumpkins favorite too.
My favourite Smashing Pumpkins song. Also really like Tonight, Tonight.
I NEVER EVER EVER EVER EVER GET TIRED OF THIS SONG!
Probably my favorite track of theirs.
beautiful song!
Great chorus.
ahhh* zašto ne mogu zaboraviti izvedbu anite matić u filmu pet minuta nježnosti? a rado bi.
This is their best. For me...
it's you that i adore!!!
Lovely girl, you’re the beauty in my world. Without you there aren’t reasons left to find (8)
best song
I love this song and I adore BC:)
~Pull Your crooked teeth, You'll be perfect just like Me~
great song!
This song makes me want to scream it out the the most perfectly "unperfect" woman.

http://lamuzi.blogspot.com/2012/06/lirinterpretacje-smashing-pumpkins.html Autor tego tekstu napisał utwór aby... "zabić" swoich rodziców brutalnym pięknem swojej muzyki. Billy Corgan i jego kompozycja - Disarm zespołu The Smashing Pumkins, bo o nim mowa, jest utworem gdzie dla jednych może stanowi wizję reflektującą zmagania dziecka, który wkracza do świata dorosłych. Dla innych jest manifestem samotnego człowieka chcącego targnąć się na swoje życie. Pozostali znaleźli w nim „dyskusję na temat aborcji”, wojny, pedofilii, nieszczęśliwej miłości etc. Według mnie, ogólny charakter utworu ukazuje „małość” człowieka w otaczającym go świecie i pośrednim wołaniem o pomoc człowieka zagubionego w rzeczywistości. A z kim utożsamicie się Wy? Sprawdźcie na LMF!
We must never be apart
It striked me that this beat sounds alot like Depech Modes-barrel of a gun! but thats me!!!!
